mapper.select: select o.*, m.id,m.business_name from orders o join member m on o.id = m.id where o.order_status = 1 order by order_no asc

SELECT m.id, m.regdate , o.order_no, o.total_price, o.order_status, d.detail_no, d.purchase_amount, p.product_no, p.price,p.product_name, ps.product_quantily FROM order_detail d INNER JOIN product p ON d.product_no=p.product_no INNER JOIN orders o ON d.order_no=o.order_no INNER JOIN member m ON o.id=m.id INNER JOIN product_stock ps ON ps.product_no = p.product_no WHERE o.order_no = #{order_no}
